# btp_subaccount_role_collection_roles (Data Source)

Lists all roles assigned to a specific subaccount role collection.

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "btp_subaccount_role_collection_roles" "all_roles" {
  subaccount_id = "1ecb7280-c7d4-4db6-b7da-7af3cdb13505"
  name          = "my_collection"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) The name of the role collection.
- `subaccount_id` (String) The ID of the subaccount.

### Read-Only

- `values` (Attributes Set) The roles assigned to the role collection. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--values))

<a id="nestedatt--values"></a>
### Nested Schema for `values`

Read-Only:

- `description` (String)
- `role_name` (String)
- `role_template_app_id` (String)
- `role_template_name` (String)
